thread.title: 2017 Toyota Corolla Automatic Tested: Sense and Sensibility
thread.title_full: 2017 Toyota Corolla Automatic Tested: Sense and Sensibility

author: Greg Fink
title: 2017 Toyota Corolla Automatic Tested: Sense and Sensibility
text:
-Historically reliable and relatively affordable, the Toyota Corolla is a prudent but unexciting choice among compact sedans. Celebrating 50 years of global sales, the Corolla enters 2017 with a host of changes that continue to appeal to consumers’ sensibilities, if not their fervor. READ MORE ›› 
-
